msg_function_center_desc: View enabled features. You can pin them to the primary menu for quick enable/disable. Add more features in
msg_close_keyword_no_reply: After closing, triggered keywords will no longer reply with specified content
msg_close_smart_menu_no_reply: After closing, other smart menu rules will not trigger replies
msg_close_auto_reply_no_content: After closing, triggered keywords and message replies will no longer respond with specified content
msg_close_confirm_payment: After closing, the configured payment strategy will be disabled. Confirm to close?
